name: Mark Timothy Agarrado
text: Well he's not yet a Darth, so the fight was mostly between two force n00bs. My headcanon of Rey's affinity to the force is that maybe she's already started Jedi training with Luke at a very young age. Then KR went batshit crazy - halting Luke's next-gen Jedi training and forces him into hiding.    At least that's what went through my head when the visions/ flashbacks were shown. But yeah - considering KR has enough skill with the Force to stop a freakin' blaster shot - it's a bit hard to reconcile. Even with his injury. Haha.
